sentences.en: Acknowledge the important role of Engineering Thermodynamics in practical project application.
sentences.cn: 了解工程热力学在工程应用中的重要作用.

sentences.en: And so we can immediately start in deriving all of the thermodynamics, right?
sentences.cn: 这样我们可以马上开始,得到所有热力学的量对吧？

sentences.en: And we went through that and saw what the thermodynamics worked out to be.
sentences.cn: 我们算出了他们,并看到了它们的热力学应该是怎样的。

sentences.en: But we know thermodynamics is all about equilibrium.
sentences.cn: 但我们知道热力学都是关于平衡的。

sentences.en: Compared with the method of thermodynamics calculation anti - disturbing and fault tolerance.
sentences.cn: 与直接热力学计算方法相比,具有突出的抗干扰性和容错能力.

sentences.en: In thermodynamics we usually deal with functions of two or more variables.
sentences.cn: 在热力学中,我们经常涉及两个或更多变量的函数.

sentences.en: On the other hand, we may resort to argument from thermodynamics.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 我们还可以凭借热力学理论.

sentences.en: Pre - course: Heat Transfer, Fluid Dynamics, Engineering Thermodynamics, Mechanics of Materials, General Chemistry.
sentences.cn: 先修课程: 传热学, 流体力学, 工程热力学, 材料力学, 普通化学.

sentences.en: The limit on thermodynamics for gas cooling is the adiabatic saturation temperatures.
sentences.cn: 煤气冷却的热力学极限是绝热饱和温度.

sentences.en: The memory capacity of the machine can be calculated using thermodynamics.
sentences.cn: 此机器的记忆容量可用热力学计算出来.

sentences.en: The theory of thermodynamics links the macroscopic and submicroscopic domains.
sentences.cn: 热力学把宏观世界同亚微观世界联系起来.

sentences.en: Therefore the deep impression that classical thermodynamics made upon me.
sentences.cn: 因此,经典热力学给了我深刻的印象.

sentences.en: Thermodynamics is a hard course to teach.
sentences.cn: 热力学是很难教的一门课。

sentences.en: Thermodynamics is concerned with energy relationships.
sentences.cn: 热力学所讨论的是能的各种关系.

sentences.en: Thermodynamics: Study of the relationships among heat, work, temperature, and energy.
sentences.cn: 热力学研究热 、 功 、 温度以及能量之间关系的物理学.

sentences.en: This unexciting generalization from experience is the zeroth law of thermodynamics.
sentences.cn: 这个由经验产生的一般规则即热力学第零定律.

sentences.en: Today, thermodynamics deals with energy and the relationship between properties of substances.
sentences.cn: 今天, 热力学研究能量和能量与物质属性之间的关系.

words.tran_cn: 热力学的；使用热动力的

trans.tran_en: the science that deals with the relationship between heat and other forms of energy
